typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesdbfile
source(output(
		movie as long,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		Rating as short,
		{Rotton Tomato} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dz1
moviesdbfile split(year <= 1920,
	year <=1940,
	year <=1960,
	year <=1980,
	disjoint: false) ~> Year@(kleinerALS1920, kleinerALS1940, kleinerALS1960, KleinerALS1980)
Year@kleinerALS1940 keyGenerate(output(movie as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
Year@kleinerALS1960 keyGenerate(output(movie as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey3
Year@KleinerALS1980 keyGenerate(output(movie as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey4
SurrogateKey2 filter(rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> Filter2
SurrogateKey3 filter(rlike(genres, 'horror')) ~> Filter3
SurrogateKey4 filter(rlike(genres, 'Adventure')) ~> Filter4
Year@kleinerALS1920 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year = title,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
Filter3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3
Filter4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink4
